oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Preparation and characterization of mixed LB films of polyaniline and cadmium arachidate
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DHANABALAN, A
DABKE, RB
DATTA, SN
KUMAR, NP
MAJOR, SS
TALWAR, SS
CONTRACTOR, AQ
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: langmuir-blodgett-films
conducting polymer
fabrication
langmuir-blodgett films
monolayers
polymers
structural properties
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Langmuir isotherms of mixed monolayers of polyaniline and cadmium arachidate have been studied, and mixed monolayers have been transferred uniformly onto substrates as Langmuir-Blodgett (LB) multilayers. The LB films were characterized by XRD, W-Vis and FTIR spectroscopy, de conductivity and cyclic voltammetric measurements. The FTIR results suggest that the films contain arachidate salt, and the XRD results indicate the presence of a layered structure in the mixed LB films. (C) 1997 Elsevier Science S.A.
